data.title: How to Control Neural Network Model Capacity With Nodes and Layers
data.description: The capacity of a deep learning neural network model controls the scope of the types of mapping functions that it is able to learn. data.title: How to Improve Performance With Transfer Learning for Deep Learning Neural Networks
data.description: An interesting benefit of deep learning neural networks is that they can be reused on related problems. Transfer learning refers to a technique for predictive modeling on a different but somehow similar problem that can then be reused partly or wholly to accelerate the training and improve the performance of a model on the problem […]

data.title: Annotate data for less with Amazon SageMaker Ground Truth and automated data labeling

data.tags: Amazon SageMaker Ground Truth, Artificial Intelligence
data.description: With Amazon SageMaker Ground Truth, you can easily and inexpensively build more accurately labeled machine learning datasets. To decrease labeling costs, use Ground Truth machine learning to choose “difficult” images that require human annotation and “easy” images that can be automatically labeled with machine learning. data.title: How to Avoid Exploding Gradients With Gradient Clipping
data.description: Training a neural network can become unstable given the choice of error function, learning rate, or even the scale of the target variable.
